item.description:
Singles New Year's Theme Party

Come join a party with great people, time to meet people individually, group get together, learn some things about personality differences, some optional games, great food. Share some of your goals for the new year. As an option, come dressed in a 2010 new decade theme.
$10.

Bring vegetarian entrees, appetizers, snacks or drinks as an option. I'll provide some of the food.

7-11pm

Herb Pearce is a master of the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops, worked with many individuals, couples, families, parents and children using this model as a therapist/coach, and he is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. He also does team building trainings in organizations and teaches the Enneagram to schools, churches, groups, clubs, etc. as well as in homes where people organize workshops for friends, family or associates. He teaches many other workshops related to communication and personality differences, spiritual and self development.

Herb's book is available to purchase.

Herb Pearce
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Singles New Year's Theme party
